group_works.title: Try to see it my way (NP)

results.title: We can work it out (NP)
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “The Secretary and Her Boss”.
Secretary (Adrienne Posta) and her boss (John Cleese) try to resolve the problems presented in the unsatisfactory manner in which they both handle visitors, telephone calls and dictation.
FOR USE ONLY IN A DOMESTIC SITUATION OR FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY.

This film starring John Cleese as the Boss and Adrienne Posta as the Secretary, demonstrates the necessity for efficient organisation in the office.

results.title: A Normal day
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Secretary”.
Following through a normal day in an office we learn about typical secretarial responsibilities such as making appointments, greeting visitors, processing incoming mail, supervising files, organising a business trip, taking dictation, and transcribing. Emphasises the personal qualities of self direction, tact, willingness to learn, judgment and enthusiasm needed to be a successful secretary.

results.title: Transcribing. - 2nd ed.
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Secretary”
Following through a typical series of transcribing assignments, we learn about the placing of work materials to avoid waste motion; establishing priorities so that rush items get out first; and typing techniques for faster, neater letters. Basic letter forms and procedures for transcribing from a dictating machine.

results.title: The Secretary: taking dictation. - [2nd ed.]
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Secretary”
A good secretary has the proper materials organised to respond quickly to the boss’s call. She knows correct posture, how to indicate special instructions, when to interrupt and when not, how to “key” dictation to letters being answered, and other routine procedures. Less often, she may record phone conversations or take the minutes of a meeting.

results.title: Cornell University: automobile safety research
results.creator_credit: Henwar Rodakiewicz, Irving Gitlin and Young America Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Search”.
Research shows the advisability of using safety belts in passenger cars; how increased safety can result from new designs for instrument panels; the development of new types of padding materials for car interiors; and the benefits of some form of chest protector on steering wheels.

results.title: [Marriage counselling]
results.creator_credit: Henwar Rodakiewicz, Irving Gitlin and CBS Television
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Search”.
Illustrates new methods of helping people avoid or overcome marital unhappiness. Presented under the guidance of the Marriage Council or Philadelphia and the University of Pennsylvania, School of Medicine, this television report explains the workings of a marriage council and discusses some of the important findings which have emerged from professional counselling. Illustrates the problems reacted by wives working, infidelity, attitudes towards children, and those difficulties that arise from the conflict between reality and the false impression held by many young people today.
